src:
Bejo Sugiantoro Bergabung, Aji Santoso Tetap Pertahankan Uston Nawawi
05 Nov 2019, 01:49 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Komposisi tim pelatih Persebaya Surabaya kembali komplet menyusul bergabungnya, Bejo Sugiantoro. Arsitek asal Sidoarjo tersebut sebelumnya meninggalkan tim untuk menjalani kursus kepelatihan A AFC.
Namun, kehadiran Bejo tidak membuat posisi Uston Nawawi tergeser. Meskipun, Uston awalnya hanya diminta untuk menggantikan Bejo selama kursus di Yogyakarta.
Uston tetap mendampingi Aji Santoso guna menatap sisa kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar. Mereka akan bekerjasama untuk mengangkat performa Persebaya.
Aji bahkan cukup senang bisa didampingi dua asisten pelatih. Menurutnya, keberadaan mereka sangat dibutuhkan untuk memberikan masukan demi kebaikan Persebaya ke depan.
"Justru saya ingin nanti asisten tiga, tidak hanya dua, karena kan banyak input kepelatihan head coach," kata Aji Santoso, pelatih Persebaya
"Kami akan berdiskusi, kalau orangnya lebih banyak lebih bagus, daripada seumpamanya satu aja," imbuh mantan arsitek Persela tersebut.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Bejo Sugiantoro Joins, Aji Santoso Keep Uston Nawawi
05 Nov 2019, 01:49 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The composition of the Persebaya Surabaya coaching team returned to complete following the joining, Bejo Sugiantoro. The architect from Sidoarjo previously left the team to undergo an AFC coaching course.
However, Bejo's presence did not displace Uston Nawawi's position. Although, Uston was initially only asked to replace Bejo during a course in Yogyakarta.
Uston still accompanied Aji Santoso to look at the rest of the 2019 Shopee League 1 competition broadcast by Indosiar. They will work together to lift the performance of Persebaya.
Aji was even quite happy to be accompanied by two assistant coaches. According to him, their existence is needed to provide input for the good of Persebaya going forward.
"Instead I want to be assistant three, not just two, because there are a lot of head coach training inputs," said Aji Santoso, coach of Persebaya
"We will discuss, if more people are better, than for example just one," added the former architect of Persela.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
